Journal Story: New tent Sierra Designs 3 pound Flashlight 1
Ship 3 days food to Mohichan Outdoor Center about 9 pounds
Uncle Dave, Halftime, Kevin, Greenville, SC
Thomas Jefferson & Halftime @ Monticello, Charlottesville, VA

Departed Bethesda on Metro train to DC 7:15 am. Amtrak train to NYC. Martz bus to Delaware Water Gap, PA. Arrived here 4:30 PM. Got 2 apples from tree. Delicious! BBQ guy @ Farmers Market in Delaware Water Gap gave me 4 samples! Black cat kept me company. Then walked a few blocks up to Church of the Mountain Hostel for the night. Ganzo, Tomorrow, Flashlight, Kid & 2 other hikers here for the night also. Met Pastor Sherry, our host, nice lady.

Departed Church of the Mountain Hostel 7:30 am. Cool, windy day. Got buzzed by a one man glider on top of the ridge - very windy - good day for him! Arrived MOC around 3 PM. In a nice big cabin that sleeps 16. Just me and Maple Leaf - he is 77 years young, native of Canada, carries a 55 pound pack! Legs like tree trunks!
Left MOC 10:30 AM arrived 3 PM at nice camp site along side the AT, set up tent, had dinner, hung bear bag, calm, cool night, quiet, still.

Departed campsite 7 AM, got water from spring 7:30 AM, got lost going around lake. GPS not accurate here. God sent 2 angels (brothers out for a day hike, very familiar with the area with a good map) to walk with me a while!!! Later one gave me half of his homemade hot noodle/sausage lunch at a viewpoint!!! Arrived Brink Shelter 3 PM. Beautiful shelter and privy with bear box and picnic table, nice! Here with me tonight are 2 brothers doing a section hike like me, they are going South, I am going North. Fantastic cool, calm weather!

Departed Brink Shelter 8 AM, arrived Route 206 11 AM, walked 1 mile to Jumboland Diner. Had a fantastic breakfast. Went next door under picnic table shelter and waited for taxi to take me to EconoLodge for the night.

Got Lakeland Bus in front of EconoLodge at 5:10 AM. About 45 degrees, calm. Took me from Newton, NJ to NYCPA bus station. Went downstairs and took subway "E" train to Jackson Heights/Roosevelt Ave, then the Q70+ SBS bus to Laguardia Airport. Great breakfast at Einsteins Bagels. Then plane non stop to JAX. In line for take off from LGA I saw a Clinton/Kane plane take off and a little while later I saw 2 Trump/Pence planes take off. Then we finally got our turn. Landed JAX and took Jacksonville city bus to downtown. Checked in to the Omni Hotel. Had pizza dinner at Chicago Pizza riverfront.
Departed JAX on Greyhound bus, arrived Tallahassee, got shuttle driver to drive me home. Arrived at home sweet home 1:30 PM   Fantastic weather entire trip!!! Blessed!!!
